description.default: A free SiYuan Note sharing plugin that allows you to generate shareable links for notebooks or documents, set access passwords, expiration times, and visitor limits, and view an overview of access to the shared content.
description.zh_CN: 一款免费的思源笔记分享插件，支持将笔记本或文档生成分享链接，设置访问密码、到期时间、访客人数限制，并可以查看分享内容的访问概览。
